name: Access the Bash Home section from the main navigation vertical menu
scenarioId: navigated_through/go_to_bach_section:Access the Bash Home section from the main navigation vertical menu
methodName: Access the Bash Home section from the main navigation vertical menu

testSteps.description: Given the user is authenticated and on the W3Schools main page
When the main navigation vertical menu has fully loaded
And the user clicks the right navigation arrow to reveal more topics
And the user locates and clicks on the “Bash” option
Then the system should load the Bash section correctly

userStory.storyName: Navigation to the Bash Home section in W3Schools
userStory.displayName: Navigation to the Bash Home section in W3Schools
userStory.narrative:
As an authenticated user in W3Schools
  I want to navigate through the main navigation bar and access the Bash section
  So that I can view the Bash Home page

title: Access the Bash Home section from the main navigation vertical menu
